oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Tom T. Hall - 2005-08-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Second of three Artist in Residence appearances by Tom T. Hall in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 10, 2005. Hosted by Keith Bilbrey. Special guests include; Mark Alan Springer; Kerry Kurt Phillips; Chris Dubois; Tim Menzies; Harley Allen; Debbie Nims; Jimmy C. Newman; Todd Snider;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tom T. Hall; Keith Bilbrey; Mark Alan Springer; Kerry Kurt Phillips; Chris Dubois; Tim Menzies; Harley Allen; Debbie Nims; Jimmy C. Newman; Todd Snider;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Introduction of Keith Bilbrey by Kyle Young. Introduction of Tom T. Hall. Performances include; When I Close My Eyes (Mark Alan Springer) -- Bigger Than The Ball (Mark Alan Springer) -- Introduction of band -- Almost Home (Kerry Kurt Phillips) -- This Ain't Nothing (Kerry Kurt Phillips) -- Who Needs Pictures (Chris Dubois and Tim Menzies) -- The Little Girl (Harley Allen and Debbie Nims) -- A Hunch (Harley Allen) -- Busted (Tom T. Hall) -- Amanda (Will Campbell) -- Intermission -- DJ For A Day (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Boo Dan - excerpt (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Back Pocket Money (Jimmy C. Newman) -- The Fallen Woman (Todd Snider) -- To Beat The Devil (Todd Snider) -- Tape Ends Before Program Does.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hall, Tom T.; Bilbrey, Keith; Springer, Mark Alan; Phillips, Kerry Kurt; Dubois, Chris; Menzies, Tim; Allen, Harley; Nims, Debbie; Newman, Jimmy C.; Snider, Todd; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
